SELECT COUNT(*) FROM S_MENU_MANAGER M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM S_MENU_VIEW_DATA WHERE MVD_DEL_YN = 'N' ) V ON M.MN_KEYNO = V.MVD_MN_KEYNO
LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO_AUTHORITY_ROLL UAR ON UAR.MN_KEYNO = M.MN_KEYNO
WHERE 1=1 AND
( MN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR V.MVD_DATA_SEARCH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') )
AND MN_HOMEDIV_C = #{MN_HOMEDIV_C} AND MN_USE_YN = 'Y' AND MN_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MN_SHOW_YN = 'Y' AND MN_PAGEDIV_C != 'SC_QXCFB'
AND UIR_KEYNO = (SELECT UIR_KEYNO FROM U_USERINFO_ROLL WHERE UIR_NAME='menuview') AND UIA_KEYNO = #{userAuth}

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(keyword SEPARATOR ' ') keyword , COUNT(*) searchCnt , A.* FROM (
SELECT #{keyword} keyword,M.*,V.MVD_DATA_SEARCH FROM S_MENU_MANAGER M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM S_MENU_VIEW_DATA WHERE MVD_DEL_YN = 'N' ) V ON M.MN_KEYNO = V.MVD_MN_KEYNO
LEFT JOIN U_USERINFO_AUTHORITY_ROLL UAR ON UAR.MN_KEYNO = M.MN_KEYNO
WHERE 1=1 AND ( MN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR V.MVD_DATA_SEARCH LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') ) AND MN_HOMEDIV_C = #{MN_HOMEDIV_C} AND MN_USE_YN = 'Y' AND MN_DEL_YN = 'N' AND MN_SHOW_YN = 'Y' AND MN_PAGEDIV_C != 'SC_QXCFB'
AND UIR_KEYNO = (SELECT UIR_KEYNO FROM U_USERINFO_ROLL WHERE UIR_NAME='menuview') AND UIA_KEYNO = #{userAuth}
) A GROUP BY MN_KEYNO
ORDER BY searchCnt DESC
ORDER BY MN_NAME
ORDER BY MN_REGDT DESC
ORDER BY searchCnt DESC
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}
